plot: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle stirs memories of her life weeks before meeting Joel, where she and her best friend Riley embark on a night to remember... one that will change their lives forever.

As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle to save him stirs memories of her life in a FEDRA orphanage. Weeks before meeting Joel, Ellie recalls joining her best friend Riley for a night to remember... one that will change the course of both of their lives - and the fate of the world - forever.—HBO

Ellie has brought Joel to a house and he asks her to go away to meet his brother Tommy. She recalls the period where she was a cadet from FEDRA and has friction with her colleague, Bethany, and later she is called the attention by Capt. Kwong. During the night her missing best friend Riley comes to her room through the windows and tells that she has joined the Fireflies. Then she offers Ellie the best night of her life. They go to a shopping mall that was closed by FEDRA and plays in the carousel, in the arcade and in other places. Until something happens.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
